Model

Class Subscription

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Subscription

  • public class Subscription
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Subscription ~ represent a single Subscription in the company Each Subscription belongs to a specific participant
    Author:
    Java Course Team 2017 - Shai Gutman, University Of Haifa - Israel

        public java.util.Date getLastDay()
        This method calculate the last date the subscription is valid for
        Returns:
        lastDate of the subscription if no nulls, null otherwise
        See Also:
        E_Periods

      • addRoomRun

        public boolean addRoomRun(RoomRun roomRunToAdd)
        This method adds a roomRun to the subscription's roomRuns array IF its new for this subscription
        Parameters:
        lessonToAdd -
        Returns:
        true if the lesson was added successfully, false otherwise

      • getNextIndex

        private int getNextIndex()
        Get the next empty cell in roomRuns to add a new roomRun to the array, if the array is out of range use the helper method to allocate new cells.
        Returns:
        the next empty index

      • expandCapacity

        private void expandCapacity()
        This method expand the roomRuns array capacity using System.arrayCopy to a multiple size array.
